summary: Managing Partner and Chief Creative Officer Roger Hurni brings a unique perspective as a creative visionary, brand strategist and business owner to the clients he serves. His background spans regional, national and international agency and entrepreneurial experience.  Client experience includes: Doubletree Hotels,Starwood Hotels & Resorts, P.F. Chang’s China Bistro, Pei Wei Asian Diner, PetSmart, Nike, ABC Network, Wells Fargo and Safeway. His depth of experience gives him the knowledge needed to develop distinctive creative solutions based on sound business acumen. His belief is that great creative and marketing results stem from the alignment of behavioral triggers along the lifetime customer engagement path. Roger has served on the Arizona Interactive Marketing Association board as it's President and was twice awarded Interactive Marketing Person of the Year. He has been also named Ad Person of the Year and was Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year Finalist. He has served as a member of the prestigious Walter Cronkite Endowment Board. And currently, he is an active board member of K2 Adventures Foundation, an organization that supports orphanages in Tanzania and Peru.
